original_text: “Then the priest is to take one of the male lambs and offer it as a guilt offering, along with the log of oil; he shall wave them before the Lord as a wave offering.
korean_text: 어린 숫양 한 마리를 가져다가 기름 한 록과 아울러 속건제로 드리되 여호와 앞에 흔들어 요제를 삼고

sentences.original_text: Then the priest is to take one of the male lambs
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 제사장은 수양 중 하나를 가져가서

sentences.original_text: and offer it as a guilt offering
along with the log of oil
he shall wave them before the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그것들을 주님 앞에서 흔들어야 합니다
